external_references.description: An, J and Malhotra, A. (2021, November 10). North Korean attackers use malicious blogs to deliver malware to high-profile South Korean targets. Retrieved December 29, 2021.
Den Iuzvyk, Tim Peck. (2025, February 13). Analyzing DEEP#DRIVE: North Korean Threat Actors Observed Exploiting Trusted Platforms for Targeted Attacks. Retrieved August 19, 2025.
Tarakanov , D.. (2013, September 11). The “Kimsuky” Operation: A North Korean APT?. Retrieved August 13, 2019.

objects.description: [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has enumerated OS type, OS version, and other information using a script or the "systeminfo" command.(Citation: Securelist Kimsuky Sept 2013)(Citation: Talos Kimsuky Nov 2021) [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has also obtained system information such as OS type, OS version, and system type through querying various Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) classes including `Win32_OperatingSystem`.(Citation: Securonix Kimsuky February 2025)
